articles.description: The National Labor Relations Board gave a group of Amazon employees the go-ahead to vote whether to form a union.
articles.content:
Amazon workers at an Alabama warehouse are moving closer to holding a unionization vote, laying the groundwork to establish the first-ever labor union representation at a U.S. Amazon facility. 
Work… [+4068 chars]

articles.title: Here's why some McDonald's restaurants are putting cameras in their dumpsters - CNN
articles.description: Jason Gates spends a lot of his time thinking about trash, and how we can generate less of it.
